Hi there:) Im renting a ROOM ONLY for 1 person ( not a flat) . Duration : 1-3 months The Apartment is located in Steglitz, Berlin In a very nice neighbourhood. 3 shopping centres ğŸ›’ within 3 to 10 mins walking. U9 is 3 mins away and Sbahn about 8 mins away! Sushi and oriental restaurants are almost 2-3 mins walk! The room is furnished ( bed, small desk, chair, side lamb and exposed wardrobe, blanket and pillow) so all you need is clothes & personal items.( towels â€¦. Etc). We clean every Sunday and share throwing the garbage. All other dispensable items & food are not shared/ offered. Deposit: 650â‚¬ Rent : 650â‚¬ all inclusive!. 4th floor No elevator. Who fits here: A clean respectful person preferably not younger than 26 years. You have a full time job/financially secured and can provide proof of income. Anmeldung is possible but not preferred. This is a 2 room apartment , no living room included. ***().*** Please have a small intro in your msgs. cleaning and quietness is very important:) ******This is a business concept wg;)******. Cheers

Room Hello girls! :) I am moving out of my wonderful shared flat at the end of the month and am therefore looking for a new tenant for my room from July 1, 2024. The room is 10,5 sq and geared to the inner yard. Due to that it is very quit. Iâ€™ve built a loft bed to have more space and an extra cozy floor just for relaxing. The room is initially limited to 3 months, but there is the possibility of an extension! Flat The flat itself is 70 sqm and includes another room (my flatmateâ€˜s), a fully equipped kitchen, hallway and bathroom as well as a big balcony on which we enjoy eating breakfast sometimes in the morning or sit together with a glas of wine in the evening.

Location The flat is conveniently located about 7 minutes walk to the s-Bahn station Charlottenburg (S,Re) and underground station Adenauerplatz (U6). To Halensee (S, Ring) it is a 10 minutes walk. Experience has shown that you can get anywhere in Berlin fairly quickly. Right around the corner (10 min sidewalk) is the Lietzensee, where I love to walk around. Also there is Lidl and BioCompany (4 minutes walk) for grocery shopping and a lot of bars, restaurants, spÃ¤tis close by.
